article: There was once a little monkey in the forest. He liked to  laugh at  everyone. He jumped from tree to tree, called all the other  _  bad names and threw bananas or stones at them. One day he saw a baby elephant near the river. "Hey, baby elephant, you are so  _  , and you'll never catch me." said the monkey. "  _  do you have to laugh at me?" the baby elephant asked. "I  _  make trouble or make anyone upset." "It's so fun." said the monkey. The monkey  went away  , jumping from tree to tree. Then he saw a turtle  _  with his mouth open. The monkey thought it would be a lot of fun putting his finger  _  the turtle's mouth. He did so,  _  the turtle shut his mouth just at that time. The monkey shouted  in pain  .The nice turtle woke up and let the monkey go. The monkey climbed up a tree and shouted all the way.
